title: KCS x NUCATS Hackathon 2024
description: Hackathon hosted by Kerridge Commercial Systems and Newcastle University's Computing and Technology Society

title: Devpost Durhack 2024
description: A Devpost project created for the Durhack hackathon in November 2024, centered around the theme of space exploration and innovation.

title: Durhack 2024
description: Attended Durhack 2024, one of the largest hackathons in Europe, which brought together talented developers, designers, and innovators.

title: NCL In Action
description: NCL in Action 24/25 is a year-long program at Newcastle University exploring AI's impact on industries, careers, and global challenges.

title: BSides NCL
description: BSides NCL is a free, one-day conference for the local information security community. It is a place to learn, share, and discuss the latest security trends.
